alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 11:28PM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Shawneetown. .Recent heavy rains in the Ohio River basin are expected to cause the river to rise above flood stage at Shawneetown next week. For the Ohio River...including Shawneetown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Shawneetown. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 43.0 feet, Several county roads are closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM CST Saturday the stage was 26.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Tuesday evening and continue rising to a crest of 41.9 feet Monday, January 10. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
